1561824300_1CNe5dawwwFVVvafLRWL184gQSySU.body:
> [gitcenter](#comment_481_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2nK5Di): What's ZeroBridge?

https://github.com/0polar/ZeroBridge

>ZeroNet proxy with pre-rendering 

Example instance: https://0net.eu.org/

This makes a static version of every ZeroNet URL, it won't allow you to post or interact with the network except reading. If one were to create a non-Javascript version of ZeroNet that would require someone to make a Python version of every ZeroNet application, ZeroTalk, ZeroMe, ZeroBlog, ZeroVoat, Millchan ... but it might be worthwhile.
